name: Card Quest
summary: Card Quest is a dungeon crawling adventure game with unique card combat. Play with a variety of unique character classes, and customize decks to fit your playstyle. Explore the strategic depth of tactical roguelike gameplay, and crush the undead plague.
info:
• 别名: 卡牌探险
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: Dungeon crawler
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2017-11-07
  • 开发: WinterSpring Games
  • 发行: Black Shell Media
